title: VPN works fine until disconnect, then not allowed to reconnect
body:
My friend would like to use a vpn to play league. He does and it works fine until he disconnects and then cannot reconnect. He has a dedicated IP address, firewalls turned off and anti virus off.

When he plays without a vpn he never has an issue.

We don't know much about networking and would greatly appreciate any help/advice anyone could provide us.

Thank you in advance :D
